test_results.test_name: Role structure validation: Valid permission + region structure
test_results.details: Roles: ['Members_CRUD', 'Regio_All'], Expected: True, Got: True, Message: Valid new structure: ['Members_CRUD'] + ['Regio_All']

test_results.details: Roles: ['System_CRUD'], Expected: True, Got: True, Message: Admin access via: ['System_CRUD']

test_results.test_name: Role structure validation: Permission without region
test_results.details: Roles: ['Members_Read'], Expected: False, Got: False, Message: Missing region role. Has permission: ['Members_Read'], needs region role

test_results.test_name: Role structure validation: Region without permission
test_results.details: Roles: ['Regio_All'], Expected: False, Got: False, Message: Missing permission role. Has region: ['Regio_All'], needs permission role
